docs.lead_paragraph: A sheriff said that investigators were confident that a car pulled from the bottom of Foss Lake contained the remains of three teenagers who disappeared in 1970.
docs.abstract: Oklahoma Sheriff Bruce Peoples says investigators are confident that one of two cars pulled from the bottom of Foss Lake contains remains of three teenagers who disappeared in 1970 on their way to a football game; cars were found by divers on a training exercise.

headline.main: Discovery in Oklahoma Lake May Solve Cold Cases
